sections.heading: graves; petition for markers.In all petitions to the county boards the petitioners shall state the names of veterans buried and the number of such graves in the townships, precincts or municipalities at the time of petitioning

sections.text:
80-108.Veterans graves; petition for markers.

In all petitions to the county boards the petitioners shall state the names of veterans buried and the number of such graves in the townships, precincts or municipalities at the time of petitioning.

SourceLaws 1909, c. 135, § 2, p. 484;R.S.1913, § 7162;C.S.1922, § 6808;C.S.1929, § 80-111;R.S.1943, § 80-108;Laws 1969, c. 752, § 5, p. 2832.
